name: terp-eventsphere
description: Terp EventSphere - Microservices-based event management system

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "USER,EVENT,REG,NOTIF,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,yellow,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/user-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/event-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/registration-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/notification-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/frontend"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n "USER,EVENT,REG,NOTIF" -c "blue,green,yellow,cyan" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/user-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/event-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/registration-service" "npm run dev --workspace=@terp-eventsphere/notification-service"
